Your electricity usage is producing %.2f kg of CO2. Try unplugging unused electronic devices.
You are making %.2f kg of CO2 from electricity. Try shutting off lights when not in use and consider taking shorter showers.
Your electricity usage is making %.2f kg of CO2. Try installing solar panels.
Your energy usage is creating %.2f kg of CO2. Consider putting your computers in sleep mode when they are not in use.
Your energy usage is generating %.2f kg of CO2. Try doing your laundry with cold water, and remember to change air filters frequently.
%.2f kg of CO2 is created from your electricity usage. Consider switching to LED light bulbs.
Your energy usage is generating %.2f kg of CO2. Try using your microwave over your oven when possible.
%.2f kg of CO2 emission comes from your energy usage. Consider managing your thermostat so your heater does not operate too often.

Your energy usage is producing as much CO2 as %.2f kg of regular garbage can produce. Consider managing your thermostat so your heater does not operate too often.

You drove %d times so far, When possible, walk or ride your bike in order to avoid carbon emissions completely. Carpooling and public transportation drastically reduce CO2 emissions by spreading them out over many riders.

You have produced %.2f kg of CO2 from home application. A better concept is probably ‘embodied energy’, which takes account of all the carbon, water and energy that goes into producing any food or manufactured item.

You have produced as much CO2 as %.2f kg of regular garbage can produce from home application. A better concept is probably ‘embodied energy’, which takes account of all the carbon, water and energy that goes into producing any food or manufactured item.

Drive a low carbon-emission vehicle. You drove %d km on Highways and cities, High mileage doesn’t always mean low CO2 emissions. All vehicles have an estimated miles-per-gallon rating. Electric cars emit almost no CO2 in Canada.
Get a hitch-mounted cargo rack. Do not buy a minivan or SUV if you do not need 4WD and/or will only occasionally need the extra space since you drove SUV %d times
You drove %d kn on highways. Speeding and unnecessary acceleration reduce mileage by up to 33/100, waste gas and money, and increase your carbon footprint.
Insulate and seal your home. You produced %.2f kg of CO2 from home application. Reduce drafts and air leaks with caulk, insulation, and weather stripping.
Insulate and seal your home. You produced as much CO2 as %.2f kg of regular garbage can produce from home application. Reduce drafts and air leaks with caulk, insulation, and weather stripping.
You drove %d km in cities. Being stuck in traffic wastes gas and unnecessarily creates CO2. Use traffic websites and apps to pick different route.
You have ridden buses and skytrains as your daily transportation %d times! Keep it up!
